title: GTA Garage Deals Web Application
description: The GTA Garage Deals is a web application developed as a group project during our Final Sem in the Software Engineering program at Centennial College. This project was completed as part of our coursework in Web Application Development and it is hosted on GitHub.

In this project I mainly focused on the design and documentation, this app provides users with a streamlined platform to discover and participate in garage sales across the Greater Toronto Area (GTA). The design is user-friendly, making it easy for both buyers and sellers to navigate and interact with the app.

title: The Magic Chef Web Application
description: The Magic Chef is a web application we developed as a group Project during our Third Sem in my Software Engineering Technician program at Centennial College. The project was completed in my Web Application Development course and it is hosted on GitHub.

This application represents my work on a collaborative software project. Some of the key skills that are involved in this project are technical writing, project management, and it simply provides users with the facility to create recipes and leave reviews on them. It is very friendly in terms of design and function, which makes working with this application quite easy for users.

title: On-the-Job Training Monitoring System
description: was developed as a group project in my BSIT program at Samar College in the Philippines. This Project is a Web and Android-based app, and I was mainly designated in the design and documentation.
The application records the student training progress, communication between students and supervisor. It is mainly helpful for the students and school.
